Generation IV.Diamond: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
Generation IV.Pearl: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
Generation IV.Platinum: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
Generation IV.HeartGold: This feared Pokémon is said to travel to worlds unknown. Some even believe that it takes lost spirits along with it.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: This feared Pokémon is said to travel to worlds unknown. Some even believe that it takes lost spirits along with it.

Generation VI.X: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
Generation VI.Y: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

Generation VIII.Sword: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.
Generation VIII.Shield: With the mouth on its belly, Dusknoir swallows its target whole. The soul is the only thing eaten— Dusknoir disgorges the body before departing.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Comes to those whose lives have come to an end and escorts their souls to the afterlife. Known to mistakenly take the souls of those who yet have life left in them, albeit rarely.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and take them to the afterlife.
Generation IX.Violet: It comes and goes between this world and the afterlife. People fear this Pokémon because it is said to suck in lost spirits and take them along.
